entries.journalContent: Well, I managed to refactor my code for the journal so my main.js now consists of about 10 lines of code. To quote Ice Cube, "today was a good day." I'm almost bummed that we have lab work the rest of the day, because I'm excited to learn new stuff!
Sadly, school has been cancelled for the day due to inclement weather. So, I get to hang out on my couch all day and code in the comfort of my sweats and slippers. Can't complain too much about that.

entries.conceptsCovered: More PUT functionality, object methods and CSS variables
entries.journalContent: Well, my edit function now works, but I honestly have no idea how it does and don't know if I ever well. I've heard people talk about the pit of despair here, and it definitely feels like I am there right now. I feel like a complete idiot and don't know what I'm doing here right now.
